Ingredients.1: 1 (8 ounce) package seasoned chicken-style vegetarian strips (such as Morningstar Farms® Chik'n Strips), diced

Ingredients.2: 2 (8 ounce) packages reduced fat cream cheese, softened

Ingredients.3: 1 (16 ounce) bottle reduced-fat ranch salad dressing

Ingredients.4: 1 (12 fluid ounce) bottle hot buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's® REDHOT Buffalo Wing Sauce)

Directions.1: Place the diced vegetarian chicken strips, cream cheese, ranch dressing, and buffalo wing sauce into a slow cooker. Cook on Low, stirring occasionally, until the cheese has melted and the dip is hot, 1 to 2 hours. Stir in the shredded cheese and serve.
